price: 49. Dheh: "Dadow! Waxaan uun anigu idiin ahay Dige Cad (digaya cadaab daran".
arabic: قُلۡ يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ إِنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ لَكُمۡ نَذِيرٞ مُّبِينٞ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qul yāayyuhā al-nāsu innamā anā lakum nadhīrun mubīnun
